SEARCH
Package it.unipd.dei.webapp.wacar.dao

Interface DataAccessObject<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the output parameter returned by the DAO.
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDAO, DeleteCarCircuitSuitabilityDAO, DeleteFavouriteDAO, DeleteOrderDAO, GetCarDAO, GetCarTypesDAO, GetCircuitDAO, GetCircuitTypesDAO, GetOrderByIdAndUserEmailDAO, GetUserByEmailDAO, InsertCarCircuitSuitabilityDAO, InsertCarDAO, InsertCarTypeDAO, InsertCircuitDAO, InsertCircuitTypeDAO, InsertFavouriteDAO, InsertOrderDAO, ListCarByAvailabilityDAO, ListCarCircuitSuitabilityDAO, ListCarDAO, ListCircuitByCarTypeDAO, ListCircuitDAO, ListFavouriteDAO, ListOrdersByEmailDAO, LoadCarImageDAO, LoadCircuitImageDAO, UpdateAccountDAO, UpdateCarDAO, UpdateCircuitDAO, UserLoginDAO, UserRegisterDAO
public interface DataAccessObject<T>
Represents a generic Data Access Object (DAO). The access() method performs the actual access to the database, while the getOutputParam() allows for retrieving any output parameters resulting from the access, if any.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Nicola Ferro (ferro@dei.unipd.it)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    DataAccessObject<T>
    access()
    Accesses the database.
    T
    getOutputParam()
    Retrieves any output parameters, after the access to the database.

  • Method Details

    • access

      DataAccessObject<T> access() throws SQLException
      Accesses the database.
      Returns:
      a reference to this DataAccessObject object.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if something goes wrong while accessing the database.

    • getOutputParam

      T getOutputParam()
      Retrieves any output parameters, after the access to the database.
      Returns:
      output parameter, or @code{null} if there is no output parameter.
